atom:content.xhtml:div:
yulup-prototype-1-0.1.11-r20612.xpi (December 06, 2006)
Changelog:
Fixed auto-update problem.
Improved Guided Tag Inserter UI behaviour.
Various editor commands (e.g. "save", "checkin", etc.) can now be accessed via keyboard shortcuts.
Editor commands are now handled via a command controller.
Improved document character set handling based on HTTP Content-Type header.
Fixed problem where widget toolbarbuttons could get out of their specified order because of asynchronous image loading.
